org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins

Class HtmlLegendCallbackProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins.HtmlLegendCallbackProxy

  • final class HtmlLegendCallbackProxy
extends Object
    Manages events from HtmlLegend, enabling and disabling event listeners on HTML elements created by plugin.
    This object is able to manage all events on CHART.JS legend also in the HTML legend one.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private CallbackProxy<BaseEventTarget.EventListenerCallback> leaveCallbackProxy 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HtmlLegendCallbackProxy()
      Creates the object configuring the callbacks for the events.

    • Method Detail

      • addListeners

        void addListeners(BaseElement element)
        Adds BaseEventTypes.CLICK, BaseEventTypes.MOUSE_MOVE and BaseEventTypes.MOUSE_LEAVE events to HTML legend element.
        Parameters:
        element - HTML legend element on which to add events listeners

      • removeListeners

        void removeListeners(BaseElement element)
        Removes BaseEventTypes.CLICK, BaseEventTypes.MOUSE_MOVE and BaseEventTypes.MOUSE_LEAVE events from HTML legend element.
        Parameters:
        element - HTML legend element on which to remove events listeners

      • handleEvent

        private void handleEvent(BaseNativeEvent event)
        This method has been invoked by legend elements when an event fires by them.
        Parameters:
        event - DOM native event generated by legend elements

      • checkParent

        private BaseHtmlElement checkParent(BaseHtmlElement child)
        Scans recursively the element to get a parent DOM element which has got TD as tag name.
        Parameters:
        child - child element to check
        Returns:
        the parent element with TD tag name or null if not found.

      • fireEvent

        private void fireEvent(IsChart chart,
                       LegendItem selectedItem,
                       BaseNativeEvent event)
        Fires the event on specific legend item, selected by native event.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance
        selectedItem - legend item instance, selected by native event
        event - DOM native event, got from legend element

      • onClick

        private void onClick(IsChart chart,
                     LegendItem selectedItem,

        Fires the CLICK event on specific legend item.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance
        selectedItem - legend item instance, selected by native event
        event - DOM native event, got from legend element

                     BaseNativeEvent event)

        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance
        selectedItem - legend item instance, selected by native event
        event - DOM native event, got from legend element

        private void onLeave(IsChart chart,
                     LegendItem selectedItem,
                     BaseNativeEvent event)
        Fires the LEAVE event on specific legend item.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance
        selectedItem - legend item instance, selected by native event
        event - DOM native event, got from legend element

      • setCursorOnLegend

        private void setCursorOnLegend(IsChart chart,
                               boolean setPointer)
        Sets the cursor point when the cursor is mouse over the legend and the default one when is mouse out.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance
        setPointer - if true, sets the cursor pointer, otherwise the default one
